subsection_analysis.refined_text: 2 cups all-purpose flour 1/2 cup sugar 1 tablespoon baking powder 1/2 teaspoon salt 1 cup milk 1/4 cup vegetable oil 1 large egg 1 teaspoon vanilla extract 1 cup fresh or frozen berries

1 pound beef sirloin, thinly sliced 1 small onion, diced 2 cloves garlic, minced 1 cup mushrooms, sliced 1 cup beef broth 1 cup sour cream 2 tablespoons flour 2 tablespoons butter 1 teaspoon paprika Salt and pepper to taste Egg noodles or rice for serving

1 whole duck 1/4 cup soy sauce 1/4 cup honey 2 tablespoons hoisin sauce 2 tablespoons rice vinegar 2 cloves garlic, minced 1 teaspoon five-spice powder 1 teaspoon grated ginger 1/4 cup green onions, sliced Mandarin pancakes for serving
2 slices whole grain bread 1/2 cup roasted eggplant slices 1/4 cup hummus 1/4 cup baby spinach 1/4 cup roasted red peppers, sliced
1 pound potato gnocchi 1/4 cup butter 2 cloves garlic, minced 8 fresh sage leaves 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese Salt and pepper to taste
